home.headline: Jɛnɛret brandable nem dɛn wit AI
home.sub: Ki wɔd dɛn in. Brand-rɛdi nem dɛn aut — Fast. In tu nɔ de. Available-domain we fayn fɔ yuz.
home.empty: No nem yet — Jɛnɛret sɔm aydia!

about.title: Bɔt Nexir
about.p1: Nexir na wan AI-pawa brand neming studio we dɛn bil fɔ di wan dɛn we mek am, di wan dɛn we mek am, ɛn di tim dɛn. We yu jɔyn intɛligent ki wɔd analisis wit rial-taym domɛyn avaylabl, Nexir de ɛp yu fɔ fɛn difrɛn, brand-rɛdi nem dɛn fast fast—so yu kin muv frɔm aydia to aydentiti wit kɔnfidɛns.
about.v1: Clarity: Nexir de pe atɛnshɔn pan rilevans, mɛmba, ɛn intent—nɔto ɛndlɛs, jenɛrik opshɔn.
about.v2: Originality: Fresh aidia dɛn we nɔ de saund random.
about.v3: Spid: Gret opshɔn dɛn insay sɛkɔn, nɔto dez.
about.ceoQuote: Nexir na fɔ gi pawa to bilda dɛn na ɛvri stej wit intɛligent nem tul dɛn we de chenj aydia dɛn to klia, kredibul, ɛn ɔnabl brand dɛn—we nɔ gɛt frikshɔn, gɛs wok, ɔ west tɛm.
about.missionBody: Fɔ ɛp di faunda dɛn fɔ tɔn aydia dɛn to klia, kredibul, ɛn ɔnaable brand aydentiti—fast.
about.visionBody: Fɔ bi di AI nem kɔmpin we dɛn kin trɔst pas ɔl fɔ bilda dɛn ɔlsay na di wɔl.

card.findDomains: Fɛn domain dɛn we de free
card.domainHint: Klik  “Fɛn domain dɛn we de free” fɔ chek .ai, .io, .app an ɔda wan dɛn.
